synopsis.text:
In the secluded Southern Cross Isle, a clandestine faction known as The Glittering Crux harbors ambitions to awaken colossal mobile suits, referred to as cybodies, that have been dormant for eons. These formidable machines can only be commanded by select individuals known as star drivers. To unlock their full potential, the enigmatic group seeks to shatter the seals of the four shrine maidens residing on the island.

Enter Takuto Tsunashi, a newcomer who finds himself on the island's shores and subsequently enrolls in Southern Cross High School. After forming new bonds, Takuto pledges to thwart The Glittering Crux's plans to protect Wako Agemaki, the vivacious girl who once saved his life and is one of the four maidens. Wako, already betrothed to her affluent and talented childhood friend, Sugata Shindou, shares a close bond with him. Despite their connection, Sugata harbors reservations about their arranged engagement due to the tradition imposed upon them.

As Takuto befriends the couple, he emerges as a steadfast guardian of the seals, revealing himself as the Galactic Pretty Boy, the skilled star driver of Tauburn, the 22nd cybody.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
